test_cases.title: Login Form Validation
test_cases.description: Verify login form validation works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Enter invalid email format
2. Verify error message
3. Enter valid email but invalid password
4. Verify error message
test_cases.precondition: User account exists in the system

test_cases.title: Navigation Menu Functionality
test_cases.description: Verify all navigation menu items work correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Click each menu item
2. Verify correct page loads

test_cases.title: Responsive Design
test_cases.description: Verify UI is responsive on different screen sizes
test_cases.steps:
1. Resize browser window
2. Verify UI adapts correctly

test_cases.title: Form Submission
test_cases.description: Verify form submission works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Fill out form
2. Submit form
3. Verify success message

test_cases.title: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify error handling works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Trigger an error
2. Verify error message is displayed

test_cases.title: Pagination
test_cases.description: Verify pagination works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Navigate to a page with pagination
2. Click next page
3. Verify page changes

test_cases.title: Sorting
test_cases.description: Verify sorting works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Click column header to sort
2. Verify data is sorted correctly

test_cases.title: Filtering
test_cases.description: Verify filtering works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Enter filter criteria
2. Verify filtered results

test_cases.title: Dark Mode Toggle
test_cases.description: Verify dark mode toggle works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Toggle dark mode
2. Verify UI changes to dark mode

test_cases.title: Accessibility
test_cases.description: Verify application meets accessibility standards
test_cases.steps:
1. Run accessibility audit
2. Verify no critical issues

test_cases.title: GET Endpoint
test_cases.description: Verify GET endpoint returns correct data
test_cases.steps:
1. Send GET request
2. Verify response status and data

test_cases.title: POST Endpoint
test_cases.description: Verify POST endpoint creates resource
test_cases.steps:
1. Send POST request
2. Verify resource is created

test_cases.title: PUT Endpoint
test_cases.description: Verify PUT endpoint updates resource
test_cases.steps:
1. Send PUT request
2. Verify resource is updated

test_cases.title: DELETE Endpoint
test_cases.description: Verify DELETE endpoint removes resource
test_cases.steps:
1. Send DELETE request
2. Verify resource is removed

test_cases.title: Authentication
test_cases.description: Verify API authentication works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Send request without token
2. Verify 401 response
3. Send request with token
4. Verify 200 response

test_cases.title: Rate Limiting
test_cases.description: Verify API rate limiting works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Send multiple requests quickly
2. Verify rate limit response

test_cases.title: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify API error handling works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Send invalid request
2. Verify error response format

test_cases.title: Pagination
test_cases.description: Verify API pagination works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Send request with pagination parameters
2. Verify paginated response

test_cases.title: Filtering
test_cases.description: Verify API filtering works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Send request with filter parameters
2. Verify filtered response

test_cases.title: Sorting
test_cases.description: Verify API sorting works correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Send request with sort parameters
2. Verify sorted response

test_cases.title: Response Time
test_cases.description: Verify API response time is within acceptable limits
test_cases.steps:
1. Send request
2. Measure response time
3. Verify within limits

test_cases.title: Load Testing
test_cases.description: Verify system handles high load
test_cases.steps:
1. Generate high load
2. Measure response times
3. Verify within limits

test_cases.title: Stress Testing
test_cases.description: Verify system behavior under extreme load
test_cases.steps:
1. Generate extreme load
2. Verify system behavior

test_cases.title: Endurance Testing
test_cases.description: Verify system performance over time
test_cases.steps:
1. Run system under load for extended period
2. Monitor performance

test_cases.title: Scalability Testing
test_cases.description: Verify system scales with increased load
test_cases.steps:
1. Gradually increase load
2. Monitor system resources

test_cases.title: Database Performance
test_cases.description: Verify database performance under load
test_cases.steps:
1. Generate database queries
2. Measure query times

test_cases.title: Memory Usage
test_cases.description: Verify memory usage is within acceptable limits
test_cases.steps:
1. Run system under load
2. Monitor memory usage

test_cases.title: CPU Usage
test_cases.description: Verify CPU usage is within acceptable limits
test_cases.steps:
1. Run system under load
2. Monitor CPU usage

test_cases.title: Network Performance
test_cases.description: Verify network performance under load
test_cases.steps:
1. Generate network traffic
2. Measure network metrics

test_cases.title: Cache Performance
test_cases.description: Verify cache performance
test_cases.steps:
1. Measure cache hit rate
2. Verify within acceptable limits

test_cases.title: SQL Injection
test_cases.description: Verify system is protected against SQL injection
test_cases.steps:
1. Attempt SQL injection attacks
2. Verify attacks are blocked

test_cases.title: XSS Protection
test_cases.description: Verify system is protected against XSS attacks
test_cases.steps:
1. Attempt XSS attacks
2. Verify attacks are blocked

test_cases.title: CSRF Protection
test_cases.description: Verify system is protected against CSRF attacks
test_cases.steps:
1. Attempt CSRF attacks
2. Verify attacks are blocked

test_cases.title: Authentication Security
test_cases.description: Verify authentication security measures
test_cases.steps:
1. Test password policies
2. Test account lockout
3. Test session timeout

test_cases.title: Authorization
test_cases.description: Verify authorization controls work correctly
test_cases.steps:
1. Test access controls
2. Verify proper authorization

test_cases.title: Data Encryption
test_cases.description: Verify sensitive data is encrypted
test_cases.steps:
1. Check database encryption
2. Check data in transit encryption

test_cases.title: File Upload Security
test_cases.description: Verify file upload security measures
test_cases.steps:
1. Attempt to upload malicious files
2. Verify they are blocked

test_cases.title: Error Handling Security
test_cases.description: Verify error handling doesn't reveal sensitive information
test_cases.steps:
1. Trigger errors
2. Verify error messages don't contain sensitive info

test_cases.title: Security Headers
test_cases.description: Verify security headers are properly set
test_cases.steps:
1. Check HTTP response headers
2. Verify security headers are present

test_cases.title: Dependency Security
test_cases.description: Verify dependencies don't have known vulnerabilities
test_cases.steps:
1. Run dependency security scan
2. Verify no critical vulnerabilities

test_cases.title: Browser Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works in different browsers
test_cases.steps:
1. Test in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
2. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Mobile Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works on mobile devices
test_cases.steps:
1. Test on iOS and Android
2. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: OS Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works on different operating systems
test_cases.steps:
1. Test on Windows, macOS, Linux
2. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Screen Resolution Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works at different screen resolutions
test_cases.steps:
1. Test at different resolutions
2. Verify UI adapts correctly

test_cases.title: Database Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works with different database versions
test_cases.steps:
1. Test with different database versions
2. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Third-Party Integration Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works with third-party integrations
test_cases.steps:
1. Test integration with third-party services
2. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Accessibility Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works with accessibility tools
test_cases.steps:
1. Test with screen readers
2. Test with keyboard navigation
3. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Network Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works under different network conditions
test_cases.steps:
1. Test with slow network
2. Test with intermittent network
3. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Internationalization Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works with different languages and locales
test_cases.steps:
1. Test with different languages
2. Test with different date/number formats
3. Verify functionality works

test_cases.title: Upgrade Compatibility
test_cases.description: Verify application works after upgrade
test_cases.steps:
1. Upgrade from previous version
2. Verify functionality works

test_case_results.comment: All menu items working as expected

test_case_results.logs: Error: Overflow detected in sidebar component

test_case_results.comment: Sorting not working for date columns

test_case_results.logs: Error: Missing alt text, low contrast, no keyboard focus indicators
Error: Able to exceed rate limit
Error: Response times exceeded 2s under load
Error: Service unavailable after 5000 concurrent users

test_case_results.comment: System scaled correctly with increased load
XSS vulnerability found in search field

test_case_results.logs: Password policies and account lockout functioning
All sensitive data encrypted at rest and in transit
No sensitive information in error messages

test_case_results.comment: Application works in all major browsers
test_case_results.logs: Tested in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
Error: Form submission not working on iOS Safari

test_case_results.comment: Application works on all tested operating systems
test_case_results.logs: Tested on Windows 10, macOS Monterey, Ubuntu 20.04

test_case_results.comment: UI adapts correctly to different resolutions
Application works with different database versions

test_case_results.logs: Error: ARIA attributes missing on interactive elements
